6abc.com/2015/04/dog-chew-toys-recalled-.snippet: Dog product maker Nylabone is recalling puppy chews due to possible salmonella contamination. The recall affects the ounce package of the puppy starter kit dog chews. The packages have an expiration date of March 22nd, 2018 stamped on the back.
